string.name: STR_EMOTION_NO_MSG
string.body: %0 waves emphatically and says it isn't so.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_SLEEP_MSG
string.body: %0 whips up a cloud and drifts off to sleep.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_OTL_MSG
string.body: %0 falls to the ground in despair.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_WING_MSG
string.body: %0 displays a beautiful pair of wings.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_WING_MSG_T
string.body: %0 shows off a spectacular pair of wings to %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_TALK_MSG
string.body: %0 talks to anyone who will listen.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CHAIR_MSG
string.body: %0 creates a comfortable place to sit.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_MEDITATE_MSG_T
string.body: %0 contemplates %1 and the meaning of life.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CARE_MSG
string.body: %0 takes out a weapon and begins polishing it.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CARE_MSG_T
string.body: %0 takes out a weapon and cleans it while looking at %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_ORDER_MSG
string.body: %0 takes out weapons and arranges them.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_IDLE_MSG_T
string.body: %0 is bored, and asks %1 to stop dawdling.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_PAPERPLANE_MSG_T
string.body: %0 throws paper airplanes in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_TRUESIGN_MSG_T
string.body: %0 lifts an O in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_FALSESIGN_MSG_T
string.body: %0 lifts an X in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_BLUEFLAG_MSG_T
string.body: %0 puts up a blue flag by %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_WHITEFLAG_MSG_T
string.body: %0 puts up a white flag by %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_PLAY_SAXOPHONE_STAND_MSG_T
string.body: %0 plays the saxophone in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_TWOFLAG_MSG
string.body: %0 puts up both the blue and white flags.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_TWOFLAG_MSG_T
string.body: %0 puts up both the blue and white flags for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEA_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEA_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 1 in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEB_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 2.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEB_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 2 in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEC_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 3.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCEC_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Wonder Girls' 2DT Dance, Part 3 in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_WONGIRLDANCED_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Tell Me Dance for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_PLAY_PET_COMM_MSG
string.body: %0 is having fun playing with a pet.

string.name: STR_CMOTION_CASH_NINJA_IDLE_DESC
string.body: Idle like a ninja, and lull them into a false sense of security.

string.name: STR_CMOTION_CASH_NINJA_REST_DESC
string.body: Rest like a ninja. With one eye open.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_BADGIRLDANCEA_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Shut Up refrain from the Bad Girl, Good Girl dance.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_BADGIRLDANCEA_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Shut Up refrain from the Bad Girl, Good Girl dance for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_BADGIRLDANCEB_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Bad Girl refrain from the Bad Girl, Good Girl dance.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_BADGIRLDANCEB_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Bad Girl refrain from the Bad Girl, Good Girl dance for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MISSADANCEA_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Because of You dance.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MISSADANCEA_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Because of You dance for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MISSADANCEB_MSG
string.body: %0 dances the Again Crab Leg dance.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MISSADANCEB_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Again Crab Leg dance for %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MISSADANCEC_MSG_T
string.body: %0 does the Fluttering Heart dance for %1.

string.name: STR_CMOTION_CASH_HOVERING_IDLE_DESC
string.body: Hover, but stay ready for action.

string.name: STR_CMOTION_CASH_HOVERING_RUN_DESC
string.body: Your feet won't even touch the ground.

string.name: STR_CMOTION_CASH_HOVERING_REST_DESC
string.body: Stay above it all, even when resting.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MAID_OMELETTE_MSG_T
string.body: %0 serves an omelet in front of %1.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MAID_SWEEPING_MSG
string.body: %0 is cleaning a floor with a broom.

string.name: STR_EMOTION_CASH_MAID_SWEEPING_MSG_T
string.body: %0 cleans a floor in front of %1.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CMOTION_CASH_SPECIAL_DESC
string.body: Changes the sign at your private store.
